name: Magical Wars
description:
• This game is a casual action shooting game where a witch girl fights!
  • The rules are very simple, just hit the opponent with a magic bullet and blow it off the stage!
  • Up to 4 people can play online!

Controls

WASD  :  Character Movement

Mouse Cursor  :  Aiming Movement

Left-click and Release  :  Shoot Magic

Follow us

Twitter:@MikageProJP

Please enjoy!
